events.title: US airmen are put on trial in Japan for war crimes

movie.title: The Purple Heart
movie.plot: This is the story of the crew of a downed bomber, captured after a run over Tokyo, early in the war. Relates the hardships the men endure while in captivity, and their final humiliation: being tried and convicted as war criminals.

events.title: Sarabjit Singh accidentally crosses the border into Pakistan and is arrested

movie.title: Sarbjit
movie.plot: Biopic of Sarabjit Singh, a farmer residing at Bhikiwind, Punjab, near the Indo-Pak border, crossed the border after having a couple of drinks. However, he was mistaken to be an Indian spy and was sentenced with capital punishment.

events.title: Hurricane Katrina devastates John Ehret High School

movie.title: Hurricane Season
movie.plot: A year after Hurricane Katrina, Al Collins, a high school basketball coach in Marrero, Louisiana, assembles a team of players who had previously attended five different schools before the disaster and leads them on the path to the state championships.
